fullText: James Franco and Chris O'Dowd bring star power to John Steinbeck's Depression-era tale, but the production feels more like a celebrity showcase than a fully realized theatrical experience.
dtliExcerpt: James Franco and Chris O'Dowd bring star power to John Steinbeck's Depression-era tale, but the production feels more like a celebrity showcase than a fully realized theatrical experience.
